qoute: Keep looking up… that’s the secret of life.
author: Charlie Brown

qoute: The first step is you have to say that you can.
author: Will Smith

qoute: Once you choose hope, anything’s possible.
author: Christopher Reeve

qoute: You can, you should, and if you’re brave enough to start, you will.
author: Stephen King

qoute: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
author: Abraham Lincoln

qoute: The best is yet to be.
author: Robert Browning

qoute: We can change our lives. We can do, have, and be exactly what we wish.
author: Tony Robbins

qoute: A problem is a chance for you to do your best.
author: Duke Ellington

qoute: The most important thing is to look ahead. The past is your anchor.
author: Maxime Lagacé
